bug.author: zshnhaque
bug.description: Hello, Deepset annotator site <denchmark-link:https://annotate.deepset.ai/login>https://annotate.deepset.ai/login</denchmark-link> doesn't seem to be working, as I am receiving 502 Gateway error.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zshnhaque>@zshnhaque</denchmark-link> , thanks for the update. Currently, we are working on resolving the issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/issues/335>#335</denchmark-link> . The service should be available soon. I will update you asap. Sorry for the circumstances.
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zshnhaque>@zshnhaque</denchmark-link> , the annotation tool is running again. Please let me know if you have any problems. Thanks for your patience!
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PiffPaffM>@PiffPaffM</denchmark-link> , we are able to access the site for annotation tool. Thank you
